definitions.definition: Fitted with windows, often of a particular kind or, in ( heraldry ) , of a specified colour.
Occupying only a part of the screen (in a window .)
examples: This game can be played both in windowed mode and in full-screen mode.

main_definition: Fitted with windows, often of a particular kind or, in ( heraldry ) , of a specified colour.
secondary_definitions: ( computing , graphical user interface ) Occupying only a part of the screen (in a window .)
